# Importing the Data



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(dplyr)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(ggExtra)
# Import the penguins dataset using the read.csv() function, built into R
penguins <- read.csv("penguins_size.csv")

penguins[c('species', 'island', 'sex')] <- lapply(penguins[c('species', 'island', 'sex')], as.factor)

penguins <- penguins |> na.omit() |> rename('Island' = 'island', 'Species' = 'species', 'Sex' = 'sex') |> filter(!(Sex == "."))
penguins <- na.omit(penguins)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm))+
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/Basic scatter-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm))+
  geom_point(shape = 16, colour = "#FF4F00")+
  labs(x = "Culmen Length (mm)", y = "Culmen Depth (mm)", title = "Culmen Length vs. Depth in \n Penguins in the Palmer Archipelago") +
  theme_ipsum()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/Basic improved-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm))+
  geom_point(shape = 16, colour = "#FF4F00")+
  labs(x = "Culmen Length (mm)", y = "Culmen Depth (mm)", title = "Culmen Length vs. Depth in \n Penguins in the Palmer Archipelago") +
  geom_smooth(method="lm")+
  theme_ipsum()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/Basic trend-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(cor(penguins$culmen_depth_mm, penguins$culmen_length_mm))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] -0.2286256
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot <- penguins |>
        ggplot(aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm))+
        geom_point(shape = 16, colour = "#FF4F00")+
        labs(x = "Culmen Length (mm)", y = "Culmen Depth (mm)", title = "Culmen Length vs. Depth in \n Penguins in the Palmer Archipelago") +
        geom_smooth(method="lm")+
        theme_ipsum()


ggMarginal(plot, type="histogram", fill = "#FF4F00", size=5, bins = 12)

ggMarginal(plot, type="boxplot", fill = "#FF4F00", size=15)

ggMarginal(plot, type="density", fill = "#FF4F00", size=10)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/distributions-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm, colour = Species))+
  geom_point(shape = 16)+
  labs(x = "Culmen Length (mm)", y = "Culmen Depth (mm)", title = "Culmen Length vs. Depth \n in Penguins in the Palmer Archipelago") +
  geom_smooth(method="lm")+
  scale_fill_few()+
  theme_ipsum()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/consider species-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
correlation <- penguins %>%
  group_by(Species) %>%
    summarise(correlation = cor(culmen_length_mm, culmen_depth_mm))

print(correlation)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 3 × 2
  Species   correlation
  <fct>           <dbl>
1 Adelie          0.386
2 Chinstrap       0.654
3 Gentoo          0.654
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm, colour = Island))+
  geom_point(shape = 16)+
  labs(x = "Culmen Length (mm)", y = "Culmen Depth (mm)", title = "Culmen Length vs. Depth \n in Penguins in the Palmer Archipelago") +
  geom_smooth(method="lm")+
  scale_fill_few()+
  theme_ipsum()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/consider island-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
correlation <- penguins %>%
  group_by(Island) %>%
    summarise(correlation = cor(culmen_length_mm, culmen_depth_mm))

print(correlation)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 3 × 2
  Island    correlation
  <fct>           <dbl>
1 Biscoe         -0.445
2 Dream           0.365
3 Torgersen       0.216
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm, colour = Sex))+
  geom_point(shape = 16)+
  labs(x = "Culmen Length (mm)", y = "Culmen Depth (mm)", title = "Culmen Length vs. Depth \n in Penguins in the Palmer Archipelago") +
  geom_smooth(method="lm")+
  scale_fill_few()+
  theme_ipsum()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/consider sex-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
correlation <- penguins %>%
  group_by(Sex) %>%
    summarise(correlation = cor(culmen_length_mm, culmen_depth_mm))

print(correlation)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 2 × 2
  Sex    correlation
  <fct>        <dbl>
1 FEMALE      -0.426
2 MALE        -0.395
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm, colour = "#FF4F00", size = flipper_length_mm))+
  geom_point(shape = 16, alpha = 0.4)+
  labs(x = "Culmen Length (mm)", y = "Culmen Depth (mm)", title = "Culmen Length vs. Depth \n in Penguins in the Palmer Archipelago") +
  geom_smooth(method="lm")+
  theme_ipsum()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/bubble-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins |>
  arrange(desc(body_mass_g)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm, colour = "#FF4F00", size = body_mass_g))+
  geom_point(shape = 16, alpha = 0.5)+
  labs(x = "Culmen Length (mm)", y = "Culmen Depth (mm)", title = "Culmen Length vs. Depth \n in Penguins in the Palmer Archipelago") +
  geom_smooth(method="lm")+
  theme_ipsum()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/bubble mass-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins |>
  arrange(desc(flipper_length_mm)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = culmen_length_mm, y = culmen_depth_mm, colour = Species, size = flipper_length_mm))+
  geom_point(shape = 16, alpha = 0.35)+
  labs(x = "Culmen Length (mm)", y = "Culmen Depth (mm)", title = "Culmen Length vs. Depth \n in Penguins in the Palmer Archipelago") +
  geom_smooth(method="lm")+
  theme_ipsum()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/bubble all-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
